import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import styles from './CurrentForecast.module.css'; import {GradeOutlined, Grade} from '@material-ui/icons'; const CurrentForecast = ({location,temperature,weatherIcon,weatherDescription,country,weekday,date,isFavorie}) => { const newWeatherIcon = weatherIcon.replace("'",""); console.log("favorie = "+favorie); return ( {location} / {country} {weekday} - {date}
{temperature}°
 {weatherDescription} pays pays pays ) } export default CurrentForecast
